usa.title: US Roofing Trends & Local Insights | Stephanie Romo Roofing
usa.description: Explore nationwide and state-specific roofing trends with Stephanie Romo Roofing (stephanieromoroofing.com). Learn about emerging materials, storm-resistant systems, insurance claim support, and local code considerations to protect your home and maximize ROI.

roof-types.title: Popular Roof Types & Their Uses | Stephanie Romo Roofing
roof-types.description: Compare common roof types—asphalt shingle, metal, tile, flat, low-slope, and green roofs—and discover which suits your home's style, budget, and climate. Get practical guidance, lifespan expectations, and installation tips from Stephanie Romo Roofing. Schedule an inspection at stephanieromoroofing.com or call [phone].

roof-materials.title: Best Roofing Materials for Your Home | Stephanie Romo Roofing
roof-materials.description: Choose the right roofing material—asphalt, metal, tile, slate, wood shake, or synthetic—based on durability, energy efficiency, maintenance, and cost. Stephanie Romo Roofing at stephanieromoroofing.com provides material comparisons, local performance data, and free estimates to help you make an informed choice. Call [phone] to get started.
